Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=23µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=23µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi DMST 22842(MIC=23µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=11µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=11µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=46µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=91µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae non-O1(MIC=11µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae non-O139(MIC=11µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=11µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=53.41±1.0µM),Human cervical carcinoma CaSki(IC50=30.81±0.2µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=50µM)
